name: D4RK and the Small Worlds
description:
The planets have all been turned small, and it's up to a young boy named D4RK to fix everything.

A game originally submitted for Ludum Dare 38 (Theme: Small Worlds)!

Check out the game's submission page!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move

Up arrow / Spacebar to jump

Q to Dash

W to attack
